subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Tests and Testing
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency on Monday rebutted accusations that it had acted unethically in connection with drug testing from the 1999 Tour de France.
snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency on Monday rebutted accusations that it had acted unethically in connection with drug testing from the 1999 Tour de France.
